str_comp_spoints("_str1a",".pp","p1").
str_comp_spoints("_str1b",".p","p1*").
str_comp_spoints("_str3",".pg","g3").
str_glob_spoints("pg2","pg2","g2").
str_glob_spoints("pg4","pg4","g4").
str_glob_spoints("pg5a","pg5a","g5").
str_glob_spoints("pg5b","pg5b","g5").
str_glob_spoints("pp1","pp1","p1").
str_glob_spoints("ppg2","ppg2","pg2").
str_glob_spoints("ppg3b","ppg3b","gstr.pg").
str_glob_spoints("ppg4","ppg4","pg4").
str_glob_spoints("ppg5a","ppg5a","pg5a").
str_glob_spoints("ppg5b","ppg5b","pg5b").
str_glob_spoints("pppg4","pppg4","ppg4").
str_glob_spoints("pppg5a","pppg5a","ppg5a").
str_glob_spoints("pppg5b","pppg5b","ppg5b").
str_spoints("str3_main",s_func,fn_exit,"ppg3a","__arg0*.pg").
str_spoints("str3_setb",s_func,fn_exit,"ppg3a","__arg0*.pg").
str_spoints("twoargs1",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs2a",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs2b",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs2c",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs3a",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs3b",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs4",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
